mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BEDU_ANS( ANS_BD_NUM, USER_NAME, CONTENT, QS_BD_NUM, ANS_LIKE_CNT, ANS_DATE, REG_DATE, REG_ID )VALUES( BEDU_ANS.NEXTVAL, #{userName}, #{content}, #{qsBdNum}, #{ansLikeCnt}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{regId} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ANS_BD_NUM as ansBdNum, CONTENT, ANS_DATE as ansDate, ANS_LIKE_CNT as ansLikeCnt, u.USER_NAME as userName FROM T_BEDU_ANS a LEFT JOIN T_BEDU_USER u ON a.USER_NAME = u.USER_ID WHERE QS_BD_NUM = #{qsBdNum} ORDER BY ANS_BD_NUM DESC)
